###  Figure 2

###  Figure 4 left, full lines

U_docc_950 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. ])
U_docc_925 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. , 4.5])
U_docc_900 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. , 4.5])
U_docc_875 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. , 4.5, 5. ])
U_docc_850 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. , 4.5, 5. ])
U_docc_825 = np.array([0. , 0.5, 1. , 1.5, 2. , 2.5, 3. , 3.5, 4. , 4.5, 5. ])
